name: Redreamer
description:
My submission for the 2021 7DFPS game jam.

It's playable from start to finish, but very rough.

Controls: (Sorry only keyboard controls at the moment.)
- w, a, s d to move.
- mouse to look.
- left click to shoot.
- spacebar to jump.
- c to crouch.

Tips:
- Crouch on top of the eggs when you find them. A green light will turn on above the egg after a couple seconds to indicate that you can hatch from that egg if you die.
